name: Robe of the Magi
description: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
72 mana, 0.3 mana regeneration and 0.6% flat base magic resistance.
6 main attack damage to intelligence heroes.
2.7 main attack damage to universal heroes.
trivia: This item is based on the Robe of the Magi from Warcraft 3.
